src_original: 16 | mahāyānaviṃśikā |  nijakāyamahaṃ vande asaṃskṛtamalakṣaṇam |  sarvvākāravaropetaṃ yuga[na]ddhapada(sa)ṅgatam ||1 ||
na kleśā bodhito bhinnā na bodhau kleśasambhavaḥ |  bhrāntitaḥ kleśasaṅkalpo bhrāntiḥ prakṛtinirmmalā ||8 ||
īryyā ca kāyikaṃ karmma vācikaṃ dharmmadeśanā |
sarvvākārāḥ sukhaṃ tattvaṃ saṅkalpoparateḥ sa te |
śūnyatā na sukhaṃ tattvaṃ na cintyaṃ na sukhaṃ sukham ||13 ||
na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ yasya na bodhiḥ sadvilakṣaṇā |
